section.p: To renounce the worship of Sig, you must pay 50 Shards in compensation to the priesthood.
‘Sig will no longer watch over you!’ says a priest.

if.if:
If you are certain you want to renounce Sig’s worship,
cross off the 50 Shards, erase Sig from the God box on your Adventure Sheet
, and lose 1 point of THIEVERY.

section.p: ‘The dungeons are full of would-be rogues who renounced the faith!’ yells a priest as you leave.
